tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
  SampleID UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  FieldID UUID NOT NULL,
  SampleDate DATE NOT NULL,
  pH FLOAT NOT NULL,
  MoistureLevel FLOAT NOT NULL,
  NutrientLevels JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE field_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(50),
  sample_date TIMESTAMP,
  pH_level FLOAT,
  nutrient_levels JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Field_Samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    sample_date DATE,
    pH_level FLOAT,
    organic_matter FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    sample_date DATE,
    ph_level DOUBLE,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    field_id INT,
    sample_id INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(field_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id)
);
CREATE TABLE fields (field_id INT PRIMARY KEY, field_name STRING, location STRING)
CREATE TABLE soil_samples (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY, field_id INT, sample_date DATE, ph_level FLOAT, moisture_percentage FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(field_id))
CREATE TABLE researchers (researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name STRING, specialization STRING)
CREATE TABLE research_projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name STRING, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, researcher_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id))
CREATE TABLE analysis_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_id INT, analysis_date DATE, nutrient_level FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id))
